title: Business Insider
description: Business Insider tells the global tech, finance, markets, media, healthcare, and strategy stories you want to know.

p: Elon Musk made it crystal clear he isn't messing around about the need for meaningful layoffs, a new report reveals.
The Pentagon said some US GPS-guided weapons given to Ukraine had been repeatedly stopped by Russian electronic warfare.
Without Manchin and Sinema, Democrats would be free to pursue a far more progressive agenda if they win in 2025.
Former President Donald Trump said in an interview with Time that "it always depends on the fairness of an election."
